Player History
Released by New York (A) on 10/31/2002...
Drafted in 6th round, 170th overall pick, by Florida in 2003...
Injured on 7/15/2004 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 7 weeks...

Won World Series with Florida in 2008...

Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2011...

Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 9/19/2012...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/27/2013...
Injured on 9/30/2013 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Florida to New York (A) on 6/23/2014 (Going to FLA: P D. VerHagen, P H. Bell, RF C. Granderson. Going to NYY: P J. Beckett, 1B J. Whitesell)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Detroit, driving in 4 runs on 9/24/2014...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2014...
Traded from New York (A) to San Francisco on 5/1/2015 (Going to SFN: 1B J. Whitesell. Going to NYY: P K. Stewart)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 9/24/2015...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 1/31/2016 (Going to SFN: RF J. Gelalich. Going to CIN: P S. Romo, 2B J. Whitesell)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/2016, hitting .538 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Florida on 5/16/2018 (Going to FLA: 2B J. Whitesell. Going to CIN: 2B J. Stonge)...
Injured on 5/16/2019 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
